topic_metadata.title: Is it possible to link/import external images from the web into Typst?

posts.name: neuralpain
posts.cooked: From the image documentation I didn’t see any mention of importing images from the web, so I just want clarification on whether or not this is possible in Typst. Thanks.
posts.raw: From the [`image` documentation](https://typst.app/docs/reference/visualize/image/) I didn't see any mention of importing images from the web, so I just want clarification on whether or not this is possible in Typst. Thanks.

posts.name: Pascal Quach
posts.cooked:
Hello! It’s not possible.

You can check out prequery and its python scripts for automating the import process. I am not aware of other alternative methods.
posts.raw:
Hello! It's not possible.

You can check out [prequery](https://github.com/SillyFreak/typst-prequery) and its python scripts for automating the import process. I am not aware of other alternative methods.

posts.name: neuralpain
posts.cooked: Oh okay. Sounds good, I’ll take a look at it and try it out.
posts.raw: Oh okay. Sounds good, I'll take a look at it and try it out.
